Title: Arbitrary Law
Plot: Albert returns to examine Maddy.  Cooper asks for twenty-four hours to finish his case.  James and Donna reaffirm their love.  Andy accidentally leads Donna and Cooper back to Mrs. Treamond's house.  Cooper is given a missing page from Laura's diary, describing the same dream he had.  The One Armed man is ill, tells Cooper he has all the clues he needs.  Catherine reveals herself to Ben, and he signs the mill back over to her.  Leland and Donna learn of Maddy's death.  Cooper calls together ever
Writer: Mark Frost, Harley Peyton, Robert Engels
GuestStars: Jane Greer, Clive Rosengren, Mae Williams, Hank Worden
